refnamediv.refpurpose: Send a file to the HTTP client

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This function causes the contents of the file specified by path to be sent as the response of the calling request. The file is not sent until the code calling this returns. Content types etc. are defaulted based on the file's extension. If this function is called, other output to the HTTP client by the caller is discarded.

refsect2.title: path
refsect2.para: Path to the file to send
